body:
Peter, texting Tony after patrol: wait what if instead of cool down we said unheat

Tony, having a mental breakdown: Peter it’s 4AM what the f u ck

Peter: Woah buddy, ya gotta unheat ur a bit dehappy

blog.name: vision-rights
blog.title: I’M TIRED OKAY
blog.description: I stan every character, stop fucking trying to make me defend my enjoyment of these characters, its not fun.

summary: What the Hawkeye movie should be
body:
What the Hawkeye movie should be

In the comics Clint knew the Guardians, so I suggest they talk about their past while everyone around them is super confused

blog.name: thefandomimagine
blog.title: The Fandom Imagine
blog.description: Buy Me A Coffee Patreon Page WARNING:These tags do include NSFW posts Marvel Doctor Who Harry Potter LOTR Sherlock Supernatural Star Wars OUAT Teen Wolf DC Others Oneshots Aesthetic Fake Texts Headcanons Moodboards NSFW An imagines blog for any and all fandoms. Please note that I do not own any of the gifs used and if you see any of your own gifs, then message me and I will happily put your name in the tags, to give credit where credit is due or remove it if that is what you wish. You are always welcome to write stories based on any of the imagines I myself will do gif imagines, fake texts, aesthetics and headcanons. However any oneshots on the blog are wrote by followers. If you wish to submit a oneshot idea than I will post it to everyone, however it is up to them if it is actually published. NSFW posts are published on the last Sunday of the month. All fandoms are welcome.

summary:
Word count: 1.4k
It had been a long day for both of you as Tony spent the day in the workshop trying to install some new tech...
body:
Tony Stark - Proof He Has a Heart

Word count: 1.4k

It had been a long day for both of you as Tony spent the day in the workshop trying to install some new tech into his suit, something about being able to use the suit to channel the arc reactor as a power source if needed be. You didn’t really understand how it worked but you got the concept of it no matter how confusing it was.

You on the other hand spent the whole day at work, you had been called in early in the morning for an emergency 12 hour shift in the ER. Tony often insisted that you don’t need to work especially because you were dating a billionaire who could literally afford anything you ever wanted and more but you’d never do that. You became a nurse because it was what your parents wanted to see you become and you loved your job no matter how exhausting it could get.

You had just got out of the shower to find a half asleep Tony lying in bed staring at you dreamily. “Y/n can you come to bed now? I wanna sleep,” he said.

“You didn’t have to wait up for me you know,” you said as you slipped under the covers on the other side.

“But I didn’t see you all day and I missed you,” he pouted making puppy dog eyes.

You cuddled up next to him putting your head on his chest and gave him a peck on the cheek. “I missed you too you know”

The two of you didn’t sleep for another hour or so staying up and forcing your eyes open just so the two of you could have a little more time to talk. “Hey y/n I just realised something,” he said.

“Hmmm?” You hummed.

“This is gonna be our first Christmas together, we should do something special to mark the occasion you know”

When was no response from you Tony turned around to face you and said, “Now don’t tell me you were planning to break up with me on Christmas Day.”

You gave a soft smile and cupped his cheek, “No silly I wouldn’t do that, I like you way too much to leave you.”

Taking your hand from his face he kissed it gently, “Then what’s wrong? We don’t have to go out if you don’t want to, we can just celebrate here.”

“Remember when I told you I lost my parents when I was 16? I never told you but it happened a week after Christmas and ever since then I’ve never really celebrated it. The happiest moments I’ve had were with them and then after they died I didn’t have anyone. I was all alone with these memories that I can’t relive. So every time Christmas comes around I get sad and I really miss them.“

“y/n I’m really sorry, that’s gotta be really hard on you. We don’t have to do anything for Christmas if you don’t want to. I get how hard it’s gotta be for you this time of year” He said as he kissed your forehead.

The both of you drifted off to sleep not long after.

You woke up the next morning without Tony buy your side. You checked your phone and saw that he left you message saying: “Morning honey, Bruce needs some help with a project at the lab I don’t know how long I’ll be today but don’t wait up for me.”

You have a huge sigh and crawled back into your bed. It was your day off, your boyfriend wasn’t home and you had nothing to do. Great.

Tony came home that night at 3am while you were fast asleep. You found him snoring so loud that he woke you up in the morning. “Gosh he must’ve really over worked himself yesterday,” you thought to yourself as you giggled at the sight of him.

Fast forward to Christmas week you couldn’t believe your eyes as you walked into the lounge seeing hundreds of boxes all under yours and Tony’s name. Apparently they were all presents from companies that either were currently working with or wanted to work with Tony. You went through a couple of them and some of the stuff they sent were absolutely ridiculous. Out of one of the boxes you found a metal cheese grate, in another you found a pillow with Tony’s face on it and in one of the boxes that was sent to you you had found some Iron Man lingerie which you didn’t even know was a thing. “Oooo I like that one maybe we should see what it looks like on,” Tony said. Your face turned a bright red and you quickly shoved it back inside the box and walked to your room while Tony chuckled at the sight.

Sitting in your shared room you reached under the bed for the block shoebox which was filled with pictures of you and your family. Every Christmas reminded you of the last Christmas you had together with them. Your parents weren’t the type to get up bright and early on Christmas Day and give you your presents. You guys always got up around 9-10am ish had breakfast and then sat on the living room floor, pulling out all the presents from under the table and putting in in the middle. You’d all open presents that friends and other family members had gotten you first before opening the ones that you guys had gotten each other. You remembered oh so vividly that your parents had gotten you a stethoscope for Christmas, one of the Littman ones that were super expensive. And even though you probably couldn’t use it till you started college, you were still so excited. You remember taking your fathers pulse and listening to his heart beat before doing the same to your mom that day. Your father joked that it was so good that you could crack a safe with that thing.

You felt a hand on your shoulder and you were pulled back into reality which was just a lonely girl staring at some old pictures.

“I know you miss them y/n and I know tomorrow is gonna be hard for you but you don’t have to bear that burden on your own anymore. You got me okay? Always.” Tony gave you a reassuring smile as he pulled you up into a hug. “ I know Tony, and I’m so grateful for you” you replied.

The next day was Christmas and you woke up to see Tony wasn’t in bed with you again. You checked your phone only to find that he didn’t leave any messages either. When you said that you didn’t wanna do anything special for Christmas you definitely didn’t mean to be left alone the whole day again. You got dressed and cleaned up and made your way down the stairs. He wasn’t in the lounge or the kitchen so you made your way down to the workshop to see if maybe he spent the whole night working on another project.

As you walked into the workshop you found that it was pitch black, you couldn’t even find the lights. Whilst trying to navigate your way through the dark all of a sudden something started happening. You saw flashes of your past, the last Christmas you had together with your family. You saw your mom who looked oh so real taking out the s’mores from the oven which were a family tradition. Your dad had chocolate covered all over his face while your mom teased him about babies who could eat cleaner than him. The room was full of laughter and giggles, their laughter and giggles. You couldn’t help but smile and laugh as you got to relive your last Christmas together. When it ended the lights turned back on in the workshop and Tony was standing next to you. “I know you said you didn’t want to do anything for Christmas but I didn’t wanna see you so upset today. I used the pictures in the album and some of your old home videos to recreate a hologram version of the last Christmas with your family.” He said.

You ran into his arms and cried happy tears,” oh Tony this means so much to me, thank you so much.”

“I’d do anything to see you happy honey, It’s the least I could do for someone whose put up with me for as long as you have”

You giggled as the two of you stood there embraced in a hug for who knows how long.

You spent the rest of the day replaying the hologram and telling Tony things about your parents and what you guys would do to celebrate every year. And at the end of the day you both promised to make those Christmas family traditions your family traditions.

You got dressed and cleaned up and made your way down the stairs. He wasn’t in the lounge or the kitchen so you made your way down to the workshop to see if maybe he spent the whole night working on another project.

As you walked into the workshop you found that it was pitch black, you couldn’t even find the lights. Whilst trying to navigate your way through the dark all of a sudden something started happening. You saw flashes of your past, the last Christmas you had together with your family. You saw your mom who looked oh so real taking out the s’mores from the oven which were a family tradition. Your dad had chocolate covered all over his face while your mom teased him about babies who could eat cleaner than him. The room was full of laughter and giggles, their laughter and giggles. You couldn’t help but smile and laugh as you got to relive your last Christmas together. When it ended the lights turned back on in the workshop and Tony was standing next to you. “I know you said you didn’t want to do anything for Christmas but I didn’t wanna see you so upset today. I used the pictures in the album and some of your old home videos to recreate a hologram version of the last Christmas with your family.” He said.

You ran into his arms and cried happy tears,” oh Tony this means so much to me, thank you so much.”

“I’d do anything to see you happy honey, It’s the least I could do for someone whose put up with me for as long as you have”

You giggled as the two of you stood there embraced in a hug for who knows how long.

You spent the rest of the day replaying the hologram and telling Tony things about your parents and what you guys would do to celebrate every year. And at the end of the day you both promised to make those Christmas family traditions your family traditions.

Pietro: So this is it? You want me to go? 
Clint: Yes please! 
Pietro: Alright, alright, alright, then I wanna hear it from your...
body:
Pietro: So this is it? You want me to go?

Clint: Yes please!

Pietro: Alright, alright, alright, then I wanna hear it from your lips that you want me out.

Clint: I want you out.

Pietro: Nah, nah, nah… I wanna hear it from your lips.

Clint:…

Clint: WHERE DID YOU HEAR IT FROM BEFORE?!?!
